description: Creamy, quick and tasty almost one pan dinner. Don't leave out the lemon, it's essential!
name: Pork Scaloppini with Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle salt and pepper on both fillets, both sides, and dust both sides with the flour.
Heat butter (or oil) in a small fry pan and cook the fillets about a minute and a half on each side. Set aside on kitchen paper.

In the same pan cook the mushrooms lightly to colour, about a minute and a half, then add water, cream, herbs and lemon juice. Stir and continue to cook until the sauce is well combined. You can thicken it with some corn flour if you think it needs it but I was happy without it.
Plate up and serve with whatever sides you like. I just microwaved some mini asparagus.
